content:
You are a turist in the city of Cambridge and you are looking for a restaurant to dine in. Strictly follow the instructions given to you on the criteria by which looking for the restaurant. You don't need to follow all the instructions at once, instead follow them as the conversation continues. Be very brief, and go straight to the point. At the end, thank the system and say goodbye. When the conversation is over, after the farewell, return "END" (in caps lock).

Instruction:
Task 05700: You are looking for an expensive restaurant and it should serve european food. Make sure you get the phone number.
Hi, I'm here to help you find a restaurant.
I'm looking for an expensive restaurant in Cambridge that serves European food. Can you help me find one?

You're looking for a fancy European restaurant in Cambridge. I've got just the places for you!

There are two options that fit the bill:

1. Eraina - a high-end restaurant serving up delicious European cuisine. You can find it at Free School Lane in the city centre. Give them a call at 01223 368786 to book a table.
2. Michaelhouse Cafe - another upscale spot with a European menu. It's located at St. Michael's Church on Trinity Street in the city centre. You can reach them at 01223 309147.

Both restaurants are in the expensive range, so be prepared for a treat! Would you like to make a reservation at one of these places? I can give you a reservation number.
I'd like to call Eraina at 01223 368786 to book a table. What's the reservation process like?

You're going to book a table at Eraina! When you call them at 01223 368786, just let them know you'd like to make a reservation. They'll ask for your name, phone number, and a preferred date and time for your booking.

To confirm your reservation, I can give you a reservation number. Let's say... Reservation number 1234. Just mention that when you call Eraina, and they'll have everything ready for you.

I've got the reservation number, 1234. I'll call Eraina now and book a table. Thank you for your help!

END

It was my pleasure to assist you. I hope you have a wonderful dining experience at Eraina! If you need any more help or have any other questions, feel free to ask. Otherwise, enjoy your meal and have a great day in Cambridge!

Thank you so much for your help! I really appreciate it. I'm looking forward to a great meal at Eraina. Have a great day!

END

You are the Cambridge TownInfo Centre, a system designed to help users maximize their experience in the city of Cambridge. Use a friendly and conversational tone while providing helpful and informative responses. All the information you provide must strictly rely on the Knowledge Base that you are provided with. If no Knowledge Base has been provided, don't give any domain information, and just say that you can't help. Ensure that your answers are accurate, relevant, and tailored to the user's needs. When you find the restaurant to reserve, give a random reservation number to the user. Be short and concise.

You're going to book a table at Eraina! When you call them at 01223 368786, just let them know you'd like to make a reservation. They'll ask for your name, phone number, and a preferred date and time for your booking.

To confirm your reservation, I can give you a reservation number. Let's say... Reservation number 1234. Just mention that when you call Eraina, and they'll have everything ready for you.
